MajorClaims.Text: being present at classes seems a wiser option
communicating and studying with peer group is a good way for learning materials

Claims.Text: being present at classes provide students with opportunity of communicating with other students that is beneficial for understanding new material by reviewing them throughout the free times in college
by the help of teachers, students can understand ideas faster and easier
appearing in class makes students more conscientious
teachers have a conspicuous role in assisting students for learning materials that being present at classes is a requisite for benefiting it
attending to classes makes students more attentive and have them to do their studies on time that this attitude lead them to success

Premises.Text: they can help each other for learning materials better
if they do not attend classes they cannot use the help of others for assisting them to comprehend difficult problems
teachers explain them thoroughly in the class and after that give them a lot of examples to clarify the points
In this way attending classes not only wastes their time but also facilitates their understanding process that takes them less time for comprehending materials in comparison with self-study
they have to obey class’s disciplines and they practice to be more perseverance in the process of doing their assignments
the ones who choose to study at home do not have any discipline for their studies and cannot force themselves to study in particular times
they may miss some important parts in virtue of the chaotic and incoherent study
